name: abad_rival_01
text: You gave up too much for your honor, Dragonus.
text_simple: you gave up too much for your honor dragonus

name: abad_rival_02
text: Back into the mist of ages, Elder Titan.

name: abad_rival_04
text: You cannot best what you can barely see.
text_simple: you cannot best what you can barely see

name: abad_rival_05
text: That Phoenix flew too close to the mist.
text_simple: that phoenix flew too close to the mist

name: abad_rival_06
text: Winter comes to an early end.

name: abad_rival_07
